did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Screenplays, publicity posters, and photographs for erotic and exploitation films directed by Russ Meyer. Includes a press kit for the film "Beneath the Valley of the Ultravixens" (1979) and the original pilot script for "The Pornies of Payton Junction" by Martin Winkler (1969). Included are screenplays for "The Desperate Women" (written by Samuel Newman), "Supervixens" (written by Meyer), "Beyond the Valley of the Dolls" (written by Roger Ebert), "Briefing for a Descent Into Hell" (written by Rik Friday), "Beneath the Valley of the Ultravixens" (written by Meyer together with R. Hyde, aka Roger Ebert), and "Vixen!" (written by Meyer; actress Erica Gavin's copy, with her annotations).

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: American film director, producer, screenwriter, cinematographer, film editor, actor, and photographer. He is known mainly for writing and directing a series of successful sexploitation films, such as "Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!"

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Screenplays, publicity posters, and photographs for erotic and exploitation films directed by Russ Meyer. Includes a press kit for the film "Beneath the Valley of the Ultravixens" (1979) and the original pilot script for "The Pornies of Payton Junction" by Martin Winkler (1969). Included are screenplays for "The Desperate Women" (written by Samuel Newman), "Supervixens" (written by Meyer), "Beyond the Valley of the Dolls" (written by Roger Ebert), "Briefing for a Descent Into Hell" (written by Rik Friday), "Beneath the Valley of the Ultravixens" (written by Meyer together with R. Hyde, aka Roger Ebert), and "Vixen!" (written by Meyer; actress Erica Gavin's copy, with her annotations).

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Russ Meyer Collection, #8562. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
